_xResult.title: Classic Luxurious Smooth Turtleneck
_xResult.longdesc:
The LUXE SMOOTH TURTLENECK is a luxurious, super-comfortable, multi-season top made with sustainable bamboo fabric. This mock turtleneck has a soft, silky-cashmere feel that provides wonderful next-to-skin comfort.

It’s made with bamboo fabric, which is naturally anti-microbial, hypoallergenic and thermal regulating. Bamboo breathes and wicks moisture away due to its porous nature. Bamboo is also one of nature’s most sustainable resources; it’s 100% biodegradable, naturally regenerative and does not require the use of any pesticides or chemicals to grow.

Look beautiful and feel beautiful in this classic, timeless design that shows the world you are fashion-forward and mindful of the environment.

Made with love and care.

  • Perfect essential

  • Designed with a slim fit that hugs the body

  • Comfortable neck, long sleeves

  • 4 way stretch bamboo fabric

  • Breathable, lightweight

Fabric: Sustainable Bamboo Knit - Smooth, soft and light-weight. Bamboo knit is a sustainable fiber made from responsibly harvested bamboo.

Content: 95% Bamboo Rayon, 5% Elastane Spandex

Care: machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry, do not bleach, steam iron with protective cloth

Colors (in order from left to right on last photo): White, Parfait Pink, Soft Pink, Amethyst, Piscine, Lavender, Blue Chalk, Black.

Model wears color Black.

properties.propvalue: Machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry, do not bleach, steam iron with protective cloth
